txt.en: Defeated the Bonds of the Drowned
Hithril of the Elves of Lórien is concerned about the shadowy waters that surround the sunken ruins of Kidzul-kâlah.

'Shades have been seen in the Gladden Fields before now, but never in such number. Someone or something stirs the shades of Kidzul-kâlah to wakefulness, [placeholder], and makes fast the bonds that keep them here. Whatever creature this may be, it must be defeated.'
Some creature stirs the shades of Kidzul-kâlah to wakefulness, and it must be defeated.
Defeat the Bonds of the Drowned
Hithril, representing the interests of the Elves of Lothlórien in the Vales of Anduin, is concerned with a darkness, deep within the sunken ruins of Kidzul-kâlah.
